com.incadencecorp.coalesce.common.helpers

Class JodaDateTimeHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.incadencecorp.coalesce.common.helpers.JodaDateTimeHelper

  • public final class JodaDateTimeHelper
extends Object
    Provides helper methods for converting between String values and DateTime objects.
    Author:
    InCadence

    • Method Detail

      • convertyyyyMMddDateStringToDateTime

        public static org.joda.time.DateTime convertyyyyMMddDateStringToDateTime(String value)
        Returns the DateTime object based on the provided value in the form of 'yyyyMMdd'. If the value cannot be correctly parsed then null is returned.
        Parameters:
        value - the date string in the form of 'yyyyMMdd'
        Returns:
        the converted date object
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.lang.NullArgumentException

      • militaryFormat

        public static String militaryFormat(org.joda.time.DateTime value,
                                    boolean dateOnly)
        Returns a String representation of the value. If dateOnly is true then only the date will be generated otherwise the format will be 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZZ'.
        Parameters:
        value - the date to be formatted as a string
        dateOnly - whether the time be included along with the date
        Returns:
        the date converted to a string

      • toMySQLDateTime

        public static String toMySQLDateTime(org.joda.time.DateTime value)
        Returns a String representation of the DateTime in the format used by MySQL.
        Parameters:
        value - the date time to be converted.
        Returns:
        the formatted string.

      • getMySQLDateTime

        public static org.joda.time.DateTime getMySQLDateTime(String value)
        Returns a DateTime converted from a date string from MySQL.
        Parameters:
        value - the MySQL string date.
        Returns:
        the converted date

      • toPostGestSQLDateTime

        public static String toPostGestSQLDateTime(org.joda.time.DateTime value)
        Returns a String representation of the DateTime in the format used by PostGest.
        Parameters:
        value - the date time to be converted.
        Returns:
        the formatted string.

      • getPostGresDateTim

        public static org.joda.time.DateTime getPostGresDateTim(String value)
        Returns a DateTime converted from a date string from PostGres. If the string cannot be parsed correctly then null is returned;
        Parameters:
        value - the PostGres string date.
        Returns:
        the converted date or null if the string cannot be parsed.

      • getElapsedGMTTimeString

        public static String getElapsedGMTTimeString(org.joda.time.DateTime forDate,
                                             boolean includeParenthesis,
                                             boolean includeTime)
        Returns a string describing the elapsed time between the forDate and the current time using GMT. 
         Examples:
 
   2014-05-06 06:08:09Z (1 minute ago)
   (1 hour till)
   (Yesterday)
   (30 days ago)
   (5 years till)
        Parameters:
        forDate - the date to compare for elapsed time.
        includeParenthesis - if surrounds parenthesis should be included.
        includeTime - if the date/time should be included.
        Returns:
        the string representing the elapsed time.

      • getElapsedGMTTimeString

        public static String getElapsedGMTTimeString(org.joda.time.DateTime forDate,
                                             boolean includeParenthesis,
                                             boolean includeDateTime,
                                             boolean dateOnly)
        Returns a string describing the elapsed time between the forDate and the current time using GMT. 
         Examples:
 
   2014-05-06 06:08:09Z (1 minute ago)
   2014-05-06 (1 hour till)
   (Yesterday)
   (30 days ago)
   (5 years till)
        Parameters:
        forDate - the date to compare for elapsed time.
        includeParenthesis - if surrounds parenthesis should be included.
        includeDateTime - if the date/time should be included.
        dateOnly - if only the date of the date/time should be included.
        Returns:
        the string representing the elapsed time.

      • getElapsedGMTTimeString

        public static String getElapsedGMTTimeString(org.joda.time.DateTime firstDate,
                                             org.joda.time.DateTime secondDate,
                                             boolean includeParenthesis,
                                             boolean includeDateTime,
                                             boolean dateOnly)
        Returns a string describing the elapsed time between the two dates using GMT. 
         Examples:
 
   2014-05-06 06:08:09Z (1 minute ago)
   2014-05-06 (1 hour till)
   (Yesterday)
   (30 days ago)
   (5 years till)
        Parameters:
        firstDate - the date beginning the elapsed time.
        secondDate - the date ending the elapsed time.
        includeParenthesis - if surrounds parenthesis should be included.
        includeDateTime - if the date/time should be included.
        dateOnly - if only the date of the date/time should be included.
        Returns:
        the string representing the elapsed time.

      • toXmlDateTimeUTC

        public static String toXmlDateTimeUTC(org.joda.time.DateTime forDate)
        Converts a DateTime to the string format used in the serialization of CoalesceEntity to XML.
        Parameters:
        forDate - the date.
        Returns:
        the string representation of the DateTime.

      • fromXmlDateTimeUTC

        public static org.joda.time.DateTime fromXmlDateTimeUTC(String xmlDate)
        Converts a date/time stored in the XML format used to serialize CoalesceEntity to a DateTime. If the string cannot be parsed then null is returned.
        Parameters:
        xmlDate - the XML date string.
        Returns:
        the DateTime representation of the XML string or null if the string cannot be parsed.

      • nowInUtc

        public static org.joda.time.DateTime nowInUtc()
        Returns a DateTime for the current time and a time zone set to UTC.
        Returns:
        the DateTime for the current time and a time zone set to UTC.

      • nowInUtcAsDate

        public static Date nowInUtcAsDate()
        Returns a DateTime for the current time and a time zone set to UTC.
        Returns:
        the DateTime for the current time and a time zone set to UTC.
